/* SQL ID: www.api.usr.user.User.updateUser Description : 수정 Query */ UPDATE TB_USER
EMAIL = #{email},
PASSWORD_HASH = #{passwordHash},
USER_NM = #{userNm},
TELNO = #{telno},
USER_STTS_CD = #{userSttsCd},
EMAIL_VRFCT_AT = #{emailVrfctAt},
PW_FAILR_CNT = #{pwFailrCnt},
LAST_LOGIN_DT = STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(CONCAT(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{lastLoginDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '), CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{lastLoginDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '))=16 THEN ':00' ELSE '' END),''), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
USE_AT = #{useAt},
CREATED_DT = STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(CONCAT(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{createdDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '), CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{createdDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '))=16 THEN ':00' ELSE '' END),''), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
UPDATED_DT = STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(CONCAT(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{updatedDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '), CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{updatedDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '))=16 THEN ':00' ELSE '' END),''), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy},
AUTH_TYPE = #{authType},
WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
